# Random Forest

```{r}
library(randomForest)
library(caret)
```

```{r}
#Load the data
train <- read.csv("data/train_rose.csv")
test <- read.csv("data/test.csv")
```

```{r}
rf <- randomForest(CARAVAN ~ ., data = train, ntree = 50, importance = TRUE)
```


```{r}
#test the model
pred <- as.numeric(predict(rf, test) > 0.5)
print(levels(factor(pred)))
print(levels(factor(test$CARAVAN)))
```

```{r}
confusionMatrix(factor(pred), factor(test$CARAVAN), positive = "1")
```
